tag_list: pool-hall, sports-bar, darts, billiards, bar--grill, recreation
overview:
Whether it’s the Super Bowl or a quiet Monday night with a little 9 ball, Fast Eddie’s® delivers a clean, friendly atmosphere. At Fast Eddie’s®, “Life is meant to Be Good”.

As Sports Taverns, each Fast Eddie’s® houses a sports viewing area, complete with multiple big screens, the latest in video gaming technology, almost World Famous eats, and unbelievable set ups for darts and foosball. Taking up most of the space, a relaxing spacious area of custom Olhausen Pool Tables – complemented with the finest in accessories. Each Fast Eddie’s® offers a full service bar with a plethora of your favorite ice cold beer served by a smiling face and a bucket of thanks.
